features: Merino wool: The highest, finest type of wool obtainable. It does not itch and is shrink treated to hold its size and shape.
Shinbone protector: Sophisticated terry construction with maximum cushioning over the shin area.
Anatomical design: Designed to precisely fit human bone structures.
body: 42% Polyamide - Nylon, 28% Acrylic, 28% Merino Wool, 2% Elastane
